tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE virtual_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    purchase_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES virtual_products(product_id)
);
CREATE TABLE transactions ( transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, user_id UUID, product_id UUID, transaction_date TIMESTAMP )
CREATE TABLE users ( user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(50), join_date TIMESTAMP )
CREATE TABLE products ( product_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, product_name VARCHAR(50), price DECIMAL(10,2), category VARCHAR(50) )
CREATE TABLE categories ( category_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, category_name VARCHAR(50) )
CREATE TABLE user_transactions ( user_id UUID, transaction_id UUID, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id), FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES transactions(transaction_id) )
